label: uncl3477
comment: Code specifying the format of an address.

values.label: Street name followed by number
values.comment: Address street name followed by address number.

values.label: Number, road type, road name in this sequence
values.comment: House number followed by type of road and name of the road.

values.label: Road type, road name, number in this sequence
values.comment: Type of the road followed by name of the road and the house number.

values.label: Unstructured address
values.comment: Unstructured address, comprising an unspecified mix of components.

values.label: Street name followed by number, building, suite
values.comment: Identifies the address component as street name followed by number, building, and suite in this sequence.

values.label: Rural route number
values.comment: Identifies the address component as the rural route number.

values.label: Post office drawer number
values.comment: Identifies the address component as the post office drawer.

values.label: Building name followed by suite
values.comment: Identifies the address component as building followed by suite.
